ತಂಬಿಗೆ ಕೈಗೆ ಬರು tambige kaige baru to be reduced to the condition of a beggar; ತಂಬಿಗೆ ತೆಗೆದುಕೊಂಡು ಹೋಗು tambige tegedukoṇḍu hōgu (sl.) to go out for passing stools.
a kind of sweetmeat made of the flours of rice and Bengal gram, coconut, with jaggery, etc.
the plant Mallotus albus (var. occidentalis) of Euphorbiaceae family.
(dial.) offerings made for the demons worshipped as gods.
to be astounded, amazed or bewildered; to be stupefied.
to cause to become unmoved, stopped (as with fear, amazement, etc.).
to turn (something or someone) aside; to fend off; to ward off.
a temporary shelter of cloth, canvas, etc., supported by one or more poles; a tent.
the cooked, husked areca nut.
a preparation of betal leaves, arecanut and lime, made for chewing.
betal leaf (or leaves) chewed with areca nut and lime.
an old tax levied on persons dealing with betal leaves or its preparations.

ತಂಬುಲ ತಿನ್ನು tambula tinnu to eat the leavings in the plate dined by another; 2. (fig.) to plead for money or to serve another abjectly for money at the cost of one's self-respect; to behave obsequiously; to cringe; ತಂಬುಲದೆಲೆ tambuladele a betal leaf used for chewing.
= ತಂಬುಲಂಗೊಡು.
to give betal leaves & areca nut (as a formal gesture).
(fig.) to entrust a responsible task.
a roll of betal leaves with areca nut passed on between two persons (usu. between a woman and her husband) from mouth to mouth.
a man who is addicted to eating betal leaves.
a man who sells betal leaves.
a servant whose duty is to make betal leaves preparation for his master.
a kind of thick liquid dish made by mixing butter milk and spices with boiled vegetables.
a musical instrument with four strings, without a fret, played by gently and uniformly plucking the strings, used for base pitch for vocal or instrumental music.
= ತಂಬೆಲರು.
= ತಂಬೆಲರು.
a cool breeze.
light that is cool and pleasant.
the light of the moon; moon-light.
the moon whose rays are cool (and pleasant).
= ತಂಬೆಳಕು.
that is much above normal; immoderately more; excessive.
to make cool or colder.
to put out (a fire, etc.); to quench; to extinguish.
to become cool or colder.
to make (another's anger, sorrow, grief, etc.) less intense or severe.
to ward (an evil, harmful thing etc.) off.
a statement of income, expenditure, etc.
the sound imitating the one made by jumping repeatedly from joy, impatience, disappointments (as by children), etc.
(jumping etc.) repeatedly and quickly.
a territory, usu. of considerable size, in which a single rulership holds sway.
the seat of power (as of a king); a throne.

= ತಕತಕ.
the sound made by boiling rice.
= ತಕತಕನೆ.
something that restricts; a restrictive or limiting condition or regulation; a restriction.
= ತಕರಾರು.
the act of contending; a strife, struggle, controversy, dispute, quarrel, etc.; a contention.
the act of objecting; an expression of opposition, disapproval or dislike; objection.

ತಕರಾರು ತೆಗೆ takarāru tege = ತಕರಾರು ಮಾಡು; ತಕರಾರು ಮಾಡು takarāru māḍu to oppose; to object; 2. to obstruct; to impede; ತಕರಾರು ಹೂಡು takarāru hūḍu = ತಕರಾರು ಮಾಡು - 1; 2.to file a petition in the court of law against someone.
an application or proceeding for review of the decision of a lower court by a higher one; an appeal.
an application for a court order or for some judicial action; a petition.
a man who habitually opposes, objects others.
an official record maintained by the village accountant with regard to encroachment of government land by individuals.
a register in which petitions, appeals etc. are recorded.
= ತಕರಾರು.
a small bar with tapered ends used for the same purpose in hand-spinning; a spindle.
a difficult situation; trouble; hardship; difficulty; affliction.
= ತಕ್ಕಿಲ್2.

crime - a) an action or an instance of negligence that is deemed injurious to the public welfare or morals or to the interests of the state and that is legally prohibited; b) a criminal activity; c) any offence, serious wrongdoing.
a man who has committed a crime; a criminal.
the letter or the sound of 'ತ '.
a loan given by the governments to farmers for meeting expenses of raising crops, and related works.
